thread.title: Kohl’s: *HOT* Clearance Finds on Yankee Candles, Star Wars Blankets, Cuddl Duds Sheet Sets & More
thread.title_full: Kohl’s: *HOT* Clearance Finds on Yankee Candles, Star Wars Blankets, Cuddl Duds Sheet Sets & More

author: Erica (Silly Sidekick)
title: Kohl’s: *HOT* Clearance Finds on Yankee Candles, Star Wars Blankets, Cuddl Duds Sheet Sets & More
text:
Kohl’s shoppers! If you have a store nearby, be sure to be on the lookout for clearance as it appears select items are marked up to 80% off – including popular items like Yankee candles, Star Wars blankets and MORE!
Plus, if you’re a Kohl’s cardholder, you should have received a mailer with a 30% off coupon, which will make these prices even sweeter. OR – if you’re not a cardholder, through March 26th, head here to print a 15% off coupon and bring it in with you to shop!
Here are some items you MAY spot…
Yankee Jar Candles starting at $5.39 (REG. $17.99+) 
ONLY $3.77 with 30% off coupon OR $4.58 with 15% off coupon !

Star Wars Blankets $7.99 (REG. $39.99) 
ONLY $5.59 with 30% off coupon OR $6.79 with 15% off coupon !

Throw Pillows $11.99 (REG. $39.99) 
ONLY $8.39 with 30% off coupon OR $10.19 with 15% off coupon !

Yankee Centerpiece $11.19 (REG. $27.99) 
ONLY $7.83 with 30% off coupon OR $9.51 with 15% off coupon !

Yankee Candle Christmas Tree $7.19 (REG. $23.99) 
ONLY $5.03 with 30% off coupon OR $6.11 with 15% off coupon !

Yankee Candle Votive Candles 59¢ (REG. $1.99) 
ONLY 41¢ with 30% off coupon OR 50¢ with 15% off coupon !

Sonoma Candles as low as $2.39 (REG. $11.99) 
As low as $1.67 with 30% off coupon OR $2.03 with 15% off coupon !

Black Series Ultrasonic Travel Humidifier $7.99 (REG. $39.99) 
ONLY $5.59 with 30% off coupon OR $6.79 with 15% off coupon !

Serta Pillow $29.99 (REG. $99.99) 
ONLY $20.99 with 30% off coupon OR $25.49 with 15% off coupon !

Cuddl Duds Full Sheet Sets $15.99 (REG. $79.99) 
ONLY $11.19 with 30% off coupon OR $13.59 with 15% off coupon !

Christmas Welcome Mats $2.49 (REG. $24.99) 
ONLY $1.74 with 30% off coupon OR $2.11 with 15% off coupon !
(Thanks, Laurie!)
